name: Shadara
description:
Shadara is a french tabletop role-playing game in which you explore a sunless world, where civilizations gathered around the giant and bright trees: the Shadaras. 

Through factions battles, political conspiracy, and the exploration of the no more inhabited world, the Zalam, discover the secrets and the mysteries of this world!

A game by Axel BASSELIER-MARCHAL, Marianne BRUSSET, Killian DIBOUES, Léonie RICHARD, Alyssia TIREL, Mélanie RODRIGUES PENTEADO.
